2.0.3.name: connect20/multi_product_editor
2.0.3.description: With Productoptions extension, create product custom option is easy and time saving. Using this extension, store admin can create custom option for product once and make it applicable for require products in single action.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
